title: Alcestis
description: In Greek myth, Alcestis is known as the ideal wife; she loved her husband so much that she died and went to the underworld in his place. In this vividly-imagined debut, Katharine Beutner gives voice to the woman behind the ideal and reveals the part of the story thatâ€™s never been told: What happened to Alcestis in the three days she spent in the underworld?
author: Katharine Beutner
